document.full_text: two house leaders invoked the bp spill in calling for more oil exploration in the gulf of mexico, while the e.p.a. administrator, visiting the region, said the spill's effects wouldn't be clear for years.
document.title: on our radar: republicans mark spill anniversary with drilling call
lines_and_colors: two house leaders invoked the bp spill in calling for more oil exploration in the gulf of mexico, while the e.p.a. administrator, visiting the region, said the spill's effects wouldn't be clear for years.
